meaning list.meaning: Ho ba lerootho haholo ka lebaka la tšabo kapa bokuli (maele)
meaning list.sentence: He turned white as a sheet when he heard the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: O ile a fetoha mosehla ha a utloa litaba.

meaning list.meaning: mosebeletsi oa ofisi, motho ea etsang mosebetsi oa kelello (maele)
meaning list.sentence: White-collar jobs are becoming more common in urban areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: Mesebetsi ea batho ba basoeu e ntse e ata haholo metseng ea litoropo.

meaning list.meaning: Ntho e bitsang chelete e ngata empa e se na thuso (maele)
meaning list.sentence: The stadium turned out to be a white elephant for the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lebala la lipapali le ile la fetoha letsete le turang empa le se na thuso bakeng sa toropo.

meaning list.meaning: Leshano le se nang kotsi kapa le nang le sepheo se setle (maele)
meaning list.sentence: She told a white lie to avoid hurting his feelings.
meaning list.sentence translation: O ile a bua leshano le lenyenyane ho qoba ho mo utloisa bohloko.

meaning list.meaning: ho pata phoso kapa bofokoli (maele)
meaning list.sentence: The company tried to whitewash the scandal.
meaning list.sentence translation: Khampani e ile ea leka ho koala sekheo seo.

meaning list.meaning: tsohle, tsohle (maele)
meaning list.sentence: When they throw a party, they go the whole nine yards with decorations and food.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ha ba etsa mokete, ba tsoa bohle ka mekhabiso le lijo.

meaning list.meaning: Ka thabo e kholo le cheseho (maele)
meaning list.sentence: I’ll be at your party with bells on!
meaning list.sentence translation: Ke tla tla moketeng oa hau ka thabo e kholo!

meaning list.meaning: Moputso kapa tlotla e fuoang motho ea tlang ho qetela (maele)
meaning list.sentence: They were awarded the wooden spoon for finishing last in the league.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ba fumane khau ea khaba ea lehong ka ho ba ba ho qetela liking.

meaning list.meaning: ho sebetsa hantle (maele)
meaning list.sentence: This new cleaning product works like a charm.
meaning list.sentence translation: Sehlahisoa sena se secha sa ho hloekisa se sebetsa hantle.

meaning list.meaning: Nke ke ka etsa kapa ho ba maemong (maele)
meaning list.sentence: I wouldn’t be caught dead wearing that outfit.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ke ne nke ke ka apara seaparo seo.

meaning list.meaning: Khafetsa, selemo le selemo, ka lilemo (maele)
meaning list.sentence: They visit the same beach year in, year out.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ba etela lebōpong le le leng selemo le selemo.

meaning list.meaning: lekoala, sebete (maele)
meaning list.sentence: He’s too yellow-bellied to confront his boss.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ke lekoala haholo ho tobana le mookameli oa hae.

word: you can't teach an old dog new tricks
phonetic american: juː kænt tiːʧ ən oʊld dɔːɡ nuː trɪks
phonetic british: juː kɑːnt tiːʧ ən əʊld dɒɡ njuː trɪks

meaning list.meaning: Ho thata ho fetola motho ea nang le mekhoa ea khale (maele)
meaning list.sentence: He refuses to learn how to use a smartphone; you can’t teach an old dog new tricks.
meaning list.sentence translation: O hana ho ithuta ho sebelisa smartphone; Ho thata ho fetola mekhoa ea khale.

word: your guess is as good as mine
phonetic american: jʊr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn
phonetic british: jɔːr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn

meaning list.meaning: Le 'na ha ke tsebe, likhakanyo tsa rona ka bobeli li kanna tsa nepahala (maele)
meaning list.sentence: Why the train is late? Your guess is as good as mine.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ke hobane'ng ha terene e ile ea fihla morao? Le 'na ha ke tsebe.
